articles.title: The Crown series five filming is halted as eight crew members test positive for coronavirus - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Crown has become the latest victim of Covid.
articles.content:
The Crown has become the latest victim of Covid, days after the Blair family were seen on set for the first time. 
Filming of the new series was halted on Wednesday after at least eight crew members… [+5720 chars]
